Service Details: - Promotes and increases interest in and knowledge of gardening and the culture of plants and flowers of all kinds- Meet other gardeners and share techniques- Parlour Show at each meeting
Meetings: - Meetings are the 1st Tuesday of the month from March to June and September to December each year- Meetings start at 7:30 p.m. at the First Lutheran Church & School Fellowship Hall (4091 Lakeshore Rd)
